N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 83.9 - Loss mitigation notification

State Regulations

Every holder that engages in the business of offering
modified mortgage loans shall adopt policies and procedures with respect to the
notification process employed by such holder as are appropriate to inform
mortgagors at risk of foreclosure about the existence of a modified mortgage
loan. Notes
